snippet: Near the end of a tense but successful spring training, Johan Santana appears to have recovered from shoulder surgery.
abstract: New York Mets pitcher Johan Santana appears to have recovered from shoulder surgery and is on the verge of being named the starter for opening day.
lead_paragraph: Near the end of a tense but successful spring training, Johan Santana appears to have recovered from shoulder surgery.

headline.seo: Johan Santana on Track to Start Mets’ Opening Game
headline.main: Santana Sets His Sights on Opening Day Start
headline.print_headline: Santana Sets His Sights On Opening Day Start
